alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 11:01AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Tammany Parish, west central Harrison and Hancock Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1101 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Picayune to near Pearlington. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln, Pearlington and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 3 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
